overview: The 18th installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. It is said that there was a suicide suicide on the top floor of a apartment complex. After that, no one lived in the whole building, and only one building in the apartment complex gave off a different atmosphere. It is said that not to get close to the building because it is cursed, which became a common recognition among the people living in this residential area.
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 18
